techmeme.title: Some popular sites like Condé Nast's titles and Reuters.com modified robots.txt to block Anthropic's bots, but Anthropic has just made new bots with other names (Jason Koebler/404 Media)
Apple debuts Apple Intelligence in the iOS 18.1, iPadOS 18.1, and macOS 15.1 developer betas, with text generation and Siri updates, but missing some features (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
A look at ByteDance's CapCut, which has 318M+ MAUs outside China, vs. ~97.4M Canva MAUs, and has made $125M so far in 2024 on mobile, per Sensor Tower (Bloomberg)
LinkedIn and Pinterest are testing programs that let publishers sell ads on their videos and pages, respectively, in exchange for a cut of the resulting revenue (Sahil Patel/The Information)
A US court ruled on July 24 that border agents must get a warrant before searching the electronic devices of US and international travelers crossing the border (Zack Whittaker/TechCrunch)
